comment: Reasons to stay in : . proposals will need to be passed at Conference . . The leadership are over a barrel : it's politically impossible for them not to sign up . It's basically a hostage situation at this point . If you don't , the party reverts .
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / reason
            :purpose (s / stay-01
                  :ARG1 (y / you)
                  :location (c / conference))
            :ARG1-of (m2 / mean-01

                        :ARG1 (p / pass-01
                              :ARG1 (t / thing
                                    :ARG1-of (p2 / propose-01))
                              :location c))))
      :snt2 (o / over
            :op1 (b / barrel)
            :domain (p3 / person
                  :ARG0-of (l / lead-02)))
      :snt3 (p4 / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (s2 / sign-up-03
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (t2 / they)
                  :ARG3 (p5 / politics)))
      :snt4 (s3 / situation
            :mod (h / hostage)
            :time (p6 / point
                  :mod (t3 / this))
            :mod (b2 / basic))
      :snt5 (r2 / reverts-01

            :condition (d / do-02
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you))))
